name: Fraudulent advertising
text: It shall be unlawful for any person to publish or circulate, directly or indirectly, any statements relating to the person's practice of dentistry that are or tend to be false, fraudulent, or misleading. [L 1917, c 136, §4; RL 1925, §1068; RL 1935, §983; am L 1937, c 220, §2; RL 1945, §2154; am L 1947, c 170, §1; am L 1949, c 177, §1; RL 1955, §61-4; HRS ; am L 1983, c 220, §2]
